## utils.getServices() function

Retrieves services from a given DID document based on provided options. If no `id` or `type` filters are provided, all defined services are returned.

Note: The DID document must adhere to the W3C DID specification.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getServices(options: {
    didDocument: DidDocument;
    id?: string;
    type?: string;
}): DidService[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { didDocument: [DidDocument](./dids.diddocument.md)<!-- -->; id?: string; type?: string; } | An object containing input parameters for retrieving services. |

**Returns:**

[DidService](./dids.didservice.md)<!-- -->\[\]

An array of services. If no matching service is found, an empty array is returned.

## Example

const didDoc = { ... }<!-- -->; // W3C DID document const services = getServices(<!-- -->{ didDocument: didDoc, type: 'DecentralizedWebNode' }<!-- -->);
